text: Podvis is a village in Municipality of Krivogaštani. Former name: Tursko. It used to be part of the former municipality of Žitoše. ==Demographics== According to the 2002 census, the village had a total of 143 inhabitants. Ethnic groups in the village include:Macedonian Census (2002), Book 5 - Total population according to the Ethnic Affiliation, Mother Tongue and Religion, The State Statistical Office, Skopje, 2002, p. 102. *Macedonians 143 ==References== Category:Villages in Krivogaštani Municipality
title: Podvis, Krivogaštani
